Dear Pierre,

 

I hope my email finds you well.

 

Could you please support in escalating the renewal concern of the following insurances to the relevant parties:

 

*	Property All Risk Insurance
*	Business Interruption Insurance
*	Public Liability Insurance
*	Workmen’s Compensation and Employers Liability Insurance
*	All Risks’ Insurance

 

Thank you once again for your kind and consistent support.

 

Best regards,

 

Jovana Pavlovic
Store Manager 

 



 

Dubai Mall – UAE

Tel: +971502109635

Email : jovana.pavlovic@guerlain.com <mailto:jovana.pavlovic@guerlain.com>

From: Cherry Ramirez <C.Ramirez@emaar.ae <mailto:C.Ramirez@emaar.ae> > 
Sent: Thursday, July 17, 2025 7:06 PM
To: Jovana PAVLOVIC <jovana.pavlovic@guerlain.com <mailto:jovana.pavlovic@guerlain.com> >
Cc: Guerlain DUBAIMALL <boutique.dubaimall@guerlain.com <mailto:boutique.dubaimall@guerlain.com> >; Samer WAHAB <samer.wahab@guerlain.com <mailto:samer.wahab@guerlain.com> >; Bouchra ELAROUI <bouchra.elaroui@guerlain.com <mailto:bouchra.elaroui@guerlain.com> >
Subject: RE: Request for Required Documentation List for Work Permit purpose

 

WARNING: This Message Is From an External Sender. Should you have any doubt, click on the report button in Outlook.

________________________________

 

Dear @Jovana PAVLOVIC <mailto:jovana.pavlovic@guerlain.com> 

 

Please see below:

 

 

Trade License including partner’s page - Available

 

In compliance with clause 6.5 of your Lease, you are kindly requested to provide us with valid and up to date insurance policies as follows:

Property All Risk Insurance: To insure all the property and effects brought by you into the Premises for the full replacement value thereof against all risks of accidental physical loss or damage.

Business Interruption Insurance (With a minimum indemnity period of at least twelve (12) months):  To cover a reduction in gross profit due to a reduction in turnover and increased cost of working expenses arising from loss or damage to the Premises by any of the perils covered under the Property All Risks Insurance.

metadata.doc_id: C1PL3LG - request for required documentation list for work permit purpose\Conversation.txt
metadata.doc_path: C:\Users\ASUS\Desktop\Outlook\C1PL3LG - request for required documentation list for work permit purpose\Conversation.txt

chunks.text:
Business Interruption Insurance (With a minimum indemnity period of at least twelve (12) months):  To cover a reduction in gross profit due to a reduction in turnover and increased cost of working expenses arising from loss or damage to the Premises by any of the perils covered under the Property All Risks Insurance. 

Public Liability Insurance: 5 million To insure against legal liability for bodily injury, personal injury or sickness to third parties, or loss, destruction or damage to any third-party property arising out of any occurrence or accident related to your occupancy in the amount as specified in Schedule 1 of your Lease. 

Workmen’s Compensation and Employers Liability Insurance:  To cover injury and occupational illness sustained by your employees arising out of and in the course of their employment with you. Such policy shall contain a clause providing for an indemnity to us and/or our employees, servants, representatives, or agents. 

‘All Risks’ Insurance:  In respect of all plate glass in the Premises whether installed prior to or after the Lease Commencement Date.

 

Pest Control Contract for the entire leased area and Licensed area – Pest control needs to be conducted before opening - twice monthly.  – existing will expire in September.

 

Fire Extinguisher Contract - Contract attested by DCD – Al Arabia – under process.

 

 

Thank you.

 

Cherry Ramirez

 

 



  

Dubai Mall Retail Relationship

Emaar Malls

M +971552917566

D +97143673053

 

emaar.com <https://url.uk.m.mimecastprotect.com/s/Ga_9CL5xyU5D6B8czTviyhX40?domain=urldefense.com>

Le contenu de ce message peut etre protege et / ou confidentiel. Si vous avez recu ou avez des raisons de croire que vous avez recu ce message par erreur, s'il vous plait, supprimez le sans le lire et avisez immediatement l'expediteur.
The contents of this message may be privileged and/or confidential. If you have received or have reason to believe you have been sent this email in error, please delete it without reading it and notify the sender immediately.
########################################################################################### 

________________________________

The content of this electronic communication is intended solely for the use of the individual or entity to whom it is addressed and any others who are specifically authorized to receive it. It may contain confidential or legally privileged information. If you are not the intended recipient you are hereby notified that any disclosure, copying, distribution or otherwise placing reliance on the contents of this information is prohibited and may be unlawful in certain legal jurisdictions. If you have received this communication in error please notify the sender immediately by responding to this email and then delete it from your system. 

________________________________
